storyInfo: Texas finally feels anger at everything unfolding in front of her. Leontuzzo finally comes to understand his father's ultimate purpose, and decides his own path.

attributes.content: Leontuzzo forgot what happened that day.
He was still too young at the time.
He knows only two things for certain.
That day was not the day his mother died.
That day was the only time he ever saw his father look somewhat lost.
He walked through the rainy streets and saw his father sitting outside the church without an umbrella.
He tried to run over to hold up his umbrella for his father, but slipped and fell.
His father picked him up. The rain was heavier than usual that day. He could not clearly see his father's expression, but was still acutely aware of his father's chagrin.
He still remembers the question his father asked him at the timeâ€”
Would Siracusa be better off without the famiglie?
Leon, Leon!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Wake up!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Unngh...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Demetri...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Why are you lying on the ground here? Where's the Don? Were you attacked?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: No... Father, he...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Right, my father! Where is he?!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Nobody knows where the Don is... And just now, Rubio broke the news about our alliance with the Saluzzos over the radio.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: He also slandered us, accusing us of joining together against Signora Sicilia. Now, all the famiglie are looking right at us.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Would Siracusa be better off without the famiglie?
That's not exactly slander, is it?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I know what my father wants to do.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Who would've thought this Rubio guy...
attributes.name: Energetic Technician

attributes.content: Was actually a complete idiot.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: What are you talking about? He's clearly a good man!
attributes.name: Energetic Technician

attributes.content: No, what I mean is what's the point of him even saying stuff like that?
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: He finally managed to climb up to that position, and now he's gonna die over a few sentences.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: What a waste of a perfectly good life.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: Are you crying?
attributes.name: Energetic Technician

attributes.content: No. I'm not.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: Want a tissue?
attributes.name: Energetic Technician

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: Who are you? Employees only.
attributes.name: Energetic Technician

attributes.content: I am the boss of Famiglia Bellone. But you can just call me Bernardo.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Huh? The Don of Famiglia Bellone?!
attributes.name: Energetic Technician

attributes.content: Wh-What brings an honored Dodici don here?
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: If memory serves me properly, this place is supposed to split off and become the secondary command tower of the new nomadic city's core.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: Then, there's one thing I'd like to ask of you.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Wh-What are you doing?
attributes.name: Energetic Technician

attributes.content: Begin the separation sequence for the secondary core area.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: ...Impossible.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But, that does explain everything.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What my father told you, that we were planning to ignite an all-out war between all the famiglie to flush Signora Sicilia out, it was a feint.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: From the very beginning, Famiglia Bellone has just been a bargaining chip for him.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Everything you see now was his design.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Everything was for the sake of a Siracusa without famiglie.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You seriously expect me to believe that the don of the most powerful famiglia in the country... is trying to destroy all the famiglie?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You have no choice but to believe, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You just said all the famiglie are looking at us, right?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Yes, but even if they believed Rubio, nobody would dare to do anything rash so soon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But, it's just a matter of time.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The fuse has already been lit...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Would Siracusa be better off without the famiglie?
Padre mio, this is what you've believed all this time.
That's why you had Demetri test me in the first place.
But, what do you want me to do?
What can I even do?
Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You said before that you'd handle things your way, Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Then, you should focus up.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Whatever the situation, at this critical moment, the don is not here. You are now the boss of the famiglia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We have to do something.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Go and tell the Saluzzos that I want to meet with Alberto.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Then, get in touch with the Rossati man, Wallach.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You mean... I see.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: What is it I hope to do?
By building goodwill through Carracci's legacy, you got the people to believe that you really chose to draw all the fire purely out of a desire to avenge him.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: It wasn't until the end that you finally revealed a sliver of your real face.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Your self-control is admirable, Rubio.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I knew a long time ago that you and Carracci were on the same path.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Neither of you were willing to accept the yoke of famiglie rule forever.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Only, he stepped onto the stage like a moth to a flame, while you concealed yourself a bit better.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: After all, I was in charge of the liquidation thirty years ago. I remembered him, and naturally, I remembered you as well.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: It came as a surprise to me that you chose to make your move now, but that brings with it opportunity.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Is the separation sequence still not complete?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: It'll be done shortly.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: I hope you know that stalling for time and playing petty tricks won't accomplish anything.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: The lives of all my colleagues are in your hands, I'm not kidding.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: I don't want anything to do with the conflicts between your big famiglie. I just hope you keep your promise.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: You say that, but the look in your eyes and the beating of your heart tells me that you're ready to die with me.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Relax. I just want to ask you a question.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Have you ever thought about what a Siracusa without famiglie would look like?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Danbrown stares blankly at the scene unfolding in front of his eyes.
He has slain many people and seen his fair share of corpses.
He became numb to the sight of blood a long time ago.
But this is something altogether different.
Danbrown, why are you still here?
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: The Don wants to meet the Bellone and Rossati bosses, so hurry up and do what you need to do!
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: What is the Don doing?
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: Are you deaf, Danbrown?
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: The Don is about to meet the Bellones, and told us to prepare.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Prepare what?
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: You don't get it?
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: The Don sincerely wanted to cooperate with the Bellones, and that broadcast just now was them trying to drag us underwater.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: How could the Don let that go unpunished?
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: The Bellones were the first to sully our honor, so it's not our fault if we're a little discourteous with them.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: The Don's meaning is obvious. Follow his orders at the meeting. Famiglia Bellone is about to be wiped from Siracusa.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Why are they chasing money and power instead of violence and conflict?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Is killing me today just a cathartic release of this violence?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Or is it because... I got in the way of the people behind you taking power?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Danbrown suddenly understands why he hasn't been able to sleep at night.
Texas knows why she has been hesitating.
She doesn't like to think, and that means when she encounters a situation in which she is forced to think, she plans everything to the letter in advance.
She anticipated this well before she ever set out on her trip to Siracusa.
She knew she would have to fight.
But, she believes that what she did in Lungmen was not fundamentally different from what she had done in Columbia or Siracusa.
She does not believe that her life in Lungmen is righteous, just as she does not believe that her life in Siracusa or Columbia was evil.
She has always dealt in the logistics of life and death.
She knew she would one day have to face the land of Siracusa.
But she had already made up her mind.
Just as she had once asked her grandfather this question:
'Isn't Siracusan morality just trampling on the lives of the people all the same?'
She even anticipated meeting up with old acquaintances like Giovanna.
She really did anticipate all of this.
And that's why she has been tossing and turning sleeplessly for several nights.
But the one thing she did not expect was that she would meet people here who wanted to change the place.
Leontuzzoâ€”even though he is the heir to a famiglia, his way of thinking is progressive. His ideas may still be immature, but they are never violent.
Laviniaâ€”a puppet of Signora Sicilia's will, but a judge who nevertheless wants the law to apply equally.
Carracciâ€”even though she never met him, she learned from many sources that he served the people as Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici.
And finallyâ€”
She used to feel that there would never be an end to all this, that she was powerless to change Siracusa, that everything was too deeply entrenched.
So she chose to run.
However, after returning this time, she's met people who wanted to make this land a better place, and they were hurt, one after another.
Would she still choose to run?
I found her! Cellinia's over here!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: She has been hesitating because her desire to return to Lungmen is real.
But at the same time, her anger towards the plight of those people is just as real.
And right before her eyes, a good man with good intentions is forced by this country to cry out, at the cost of his life.
That is when Texas realizesâ€”
Never in her life has she felt so outraged.
Woah, what's with the crowd?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Looks like some of them are starting to charge.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't blame me for this, Texas. I've already done what I could.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Why would I blame you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Heya, partner, you get a good rest?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Good enough.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You look pretty mad.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So you can tell.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Of course. Just like how you can guess what I wanna eat from my mood.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: We've been partners for so many years.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Exusiai, a good man just died.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I heard.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There's something I want to do for him.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I was thinking the same thing.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Do my ears deceive me, Texas?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're planning on staying, aren't you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Thank you for 'doing your best' to help me get back to Lungmen.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But I've already made up my mind.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: There are a few people out there who don't deserve to die like that. They need help. They deserve it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Can you actually do anything about that?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Is this little fairy tale enough to make you choose a different path?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: This little fairy tale is more than enough to make me choose a different path.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Some things aren't that complicated at all, Lappland.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You, on the other hand...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: How long are you going to stay on a leash?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What, are you lecturing me now?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Take it as a little advice from someone's who been there.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Exusiai, I'm going to break the encirclement. Back me up.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Texas, you're always full of surprises.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Aha... Haha, ahaha!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The sounds of footsteps and screams gradually dissipate with Texas and Exusiai's departure, and the alley falls silent again.
Only the hollow laughter of the lone white wolf continues to reverberate.
Until she too stops laughing.
She turns her gaze in a certain direction. Not the one Texas left, but rather where Famiglia Saluzzo resides.
Father... He.... Urk....
attributes.name: Rubio's Daughter

attributes.content: Feel any better?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Rubio's Daughter

attributes.content: Your Honor, why would my father do something like that?
attributes.name: Rubio's Daughter

attributes.content: I wish he would've kept doing what he did before... If only he'd just kept on being an ordinary segretario...
attributes.name: Rubio's Daughter

attributes.content: You might not understand this yet, but your father was a great man.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'll send people to keep you safe. Stay inside, and don't wander out. Alright?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I-I can feel it... After what my father has done, the whole city is going to turn upside-down.
attributes.name: Rubio's Daughter

attributes.content: You should hide here with me.
attributes.name: Rubio's Daughter

attributes.content: Thank you, but I have work to do.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia walks out of the room.
The peal of that gunshot resounds through Volsinii. Even the dark clouds part for a few minutes as if spooked, letting a few strands of sunlight filter through, for the first time in ages.
Her agreement with Bernardo was once her only goal.
To the point that when she found out Bernardo had broken his promise, she didn't know what to do with herself.
But now, she knows.
Because she's been told she does not stand alone.
And the ones who told her made a sacrifice a hundred times more heroic than her struggles.
Compared to them, she might actually be the lucky one.
But she does not plan to stand by and rely on this luck.
Ministro Rubio, your sacrifice will not be in vain.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: She strokes the codex in her hands, a few names from Rubio's diary still lingering in her head.
She has either seen them before, or heard of them.
This is the most bountiful legacy that Rubio has left behind for her.
Moreoverâ€”
Who is it?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics. Need something delivered?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Don Alberto.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I came because I heard Bellone wanted to speak with me.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: What, does Bernardo not even dare to show his face?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: My father made his own decision.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Just trust that I can speak on behalf of Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You mean to tell me that you have a satisfactory explanation for all this?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Or, are you confident enough to deal with the fallout?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: What I wanted to say isâ€”â€”
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Danbrown, I didn't call for you to come out yet.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: No, the time is now, old man.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: Danbrown points the weapon in his hand at Alberto.
Danbrown, I'm afraid you're pointing your knife at the wrong target.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I don't make mistakes.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: Look what the famiglie bosses have become.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: You all sit high-and-mighty above the rest of us, talking all fancy about your politics, trends, country, and future.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: But what's the reality? The only thing you give a damn about is your own business.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: We took the times with violence, old man.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: Why not take a little pride in it?
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: The times have changed, Danbrown. Why don't you understand this?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: We're shaping the times as we want.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I don't understand it. I just see us turning weak and stupid.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: We don't take pride in our instincts, and we don't use peace to fight for peace.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: If we keep this up, what will we become?
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: We won't become anything.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: No, we're not a pack of wolves anymore.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: We're monsters hiding in human skin.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: And, our leaders.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: You.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: And you.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: You aren't more civilized. You're just more hypocritical.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: Looks like I should've kept you on a tighter leash, Danbrown.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: This isn't your podium.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Nobody could've caught what happens next.
In the blink of an eye, Alberto appears behind Danbrown.
A streak of blood appears across the carwash worker's throat.
He grips his neck, his eyes wide, unable to make a sound.
Then, he slowly slumps to the ground, maintaining this posture.
He will never speak again.
Now that this matter is resolved, I won't beat around the bush, Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Your father convinced me to agree to combine our famiglie's forces to take down Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But I don't see sincerity in anything you've done.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The people know that I, Don Alberto, never place a bet lightly. What they don't know is that once I do, I never stop until I win.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Submit to Famiglia Saluzzo, or die, here and now.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You have ten seconds.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Alberto takes out an antiquated pocket watch from his waist and begins counting down Leontuzzo's fate.
You've always got the option of violence, but you refrain from using it because of your upbringing and self-control. I'd even like to thank you for your kindness.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's not what I meant.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And I'm not blaming you either, Leon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: For you to even consider why the rain hasn't stopped is already exceptionally rare to see.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You've subconsciously lumped yourself in with Lavinia and Carracci.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But don't ever forget, you are not one of them.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If you really knew, you wouldn't be standing here.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo thought he understood what they were trying to say.
He could never truly be Lavinia's ally. He would always be his father's son.
This is the life he was born into, something he cannot change. And in spite of that, he's always believed he has done his best.
Is his best not good enough?
Butâ€”
You aren't more civilized. You're just more hypocritical.
attributes.name: Danbrown

attributes.content: This is the moment when he finally awakens.
It isn't a question of good enough. He has been wrong from the very beginning.
We aren't more civilized. We're just more hypocritical.
We aren't more civilized. We're just more hypocritical!
Right. That's right.
Why is he sitting here?
Why did he still think he could resolve this like the famiglie do?
He knew the answer all along.
But he chose to ignore this answer for the longest time because of who he is and where he came from.
Everything he's done before was just violence wrapped up in pretense.
And civility... can never be born from violence.
You're running short on time, Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I choose...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What just happened?!
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Boss! The secondary core area! Someone started the separation program!
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: What did you say?!
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: So this is your last resort, father.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Then, I'llâ€”â€”
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Too naive.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Hmph, you're pretty fast for your age.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: A Rossati?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Leon, I'm here.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You go on ahead. I'll handle this.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I see, so this is Bellone's trump card...
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But, are you sure you really want to make an enemy of me, Don Alberto, and of the Saluzzos?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You expect me to believe you were ever really going to be our friend?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Shared interest could've been the bond connecting us, pup.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But, there's something to your youthful delusions, thinking you can actually turn things upside-down.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You old fossils always think you can control everything, but you never stop to consider whether the times have left you behind.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Come then, pups. Let me try your hand.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Leontuzzo knows that as the don of a famiglia, he should return home and navigate his people through these turbulent times to maximize their profit.
But as a man who thinks he understands Lavinia's ideals, a man who saw the way Carracci conducted himself, as a man who has always been lost...
He's never been clearer about what he should do next.
He can't lie to himself anymore.
I'm sorry, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He does not walk the path of his famiglia.
He knows where his father is.
I did what I had to do.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: It won't be long before it reaches Zaaro.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: The time has come.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Agnese's Fang, Lunacub.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You've kept me waiting.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You're never alone, and I'm not good at taking a lot of opponents at once.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I don't make a wise target.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Agnese told me that of the remaining Fangs, you are the one who most deserves to die.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You've toyed around with the thing called 'power,' trying to use that garbage to win this.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Quite the profound insight from la Signora dei Lupi.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Do you know where the remaining Fangs are?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: One now lives at a company called Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: She returned to Siracusa not too long ago.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Another, knowing that there was no hope of victory, went into hiding and cultivated a student early.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: These two wandering wolves have now returned to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Another is still hiding in the wastes.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: And as long as I remain here, I can track their movements.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: With a little more power, I could exercise my will to find them, and have my men eliminate them.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: This is what Zaaro discovered â€” the might of power.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Does that count as victory?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: It's what he believes.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: How strange.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: The strange one is you, Fang of Agnese. You didn't come here to kill me, did you?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I was just a little curious.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You don't seem like an evil man, or one who wields power as you claimed.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: What do you see when you look at me, then?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: A beast who went looking for a place to die, now laying peacefully in it.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Are those wise guys gone yet?
attributes.name: Terrified Waiter

attributes.content: They're gone, right?
attributes.name: Fearful Waiter

attributes.content: Thank goodness, I thought they were going to start fighting.
attributes.name: Terrified Waiter

attributes.content: But... what are we going to do with this body?
attributes.name: Fearful Waiter

attributes.content: I... I don't want to touch it.
attributes.name: Terrified Waiter

attributes.content: Still, I can't help but feel a bit bad for this guy.
attributes.name: Fearful Waiter

attributes.content: I'll handle it.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Wh-Who are you?
attributes.name: Fearful Waiter

attributes.content: Just a friend of this nameless man.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You've discovered something important, my friend.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Violence is done in the name of civility.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: That is the true nature of the famiglie.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: And we must come to termsâ€”
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: With what we call civility, even if it's another pretense, even if it's just a form of self-restraint...
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Even if it's only a stone's throw from our basest instincts...
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: An earnest desire for civility will always be different from using it to whitewash your sins.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Neither this country nor this city will remember you.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: But I will remember you, Danbrown, the carwash worker.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Together with Rubio, the two of you have proven the lie that famiglie can change and adapt.
attributes.name: Ben
